1051:1: atrāha - yadyapi gatiśca gantā ca gantavyaṃ ca na vidyate,
1051:4: darśanaṃ śravaṇaṃ ghrāṇaṃ rasanaṃ sparśanaṃ manaḥ |
1051:11: yathā darśanaṃ rūpaṃ na paśyati tathā pratipādayannāha -
1051:12: svamātmānaṃ darśanaṃ hi tattameva na paśyati |
1051:13: na paśyati yadātmānaṃ kathaṃ drakṣyati tatparān ||2||
1051:14: tatra tadeva darśanaṃ svātmānaṃ na paśyati svātmani kriyāvirodhāt |
1051:19: tathā hi agniḥparātmānameva dahati na svātmānam,
1051:20: evaṃ darśanaṃ parāneva drakṣyati na svātmānamiti |
1051:24: sa na paryāpto nālaṃ na samartho na yujyata ityarthaḥ | yasmāt -
1051:28: so'pi saha darśanena dārṣṭāntikārthena pratyukto dūṣitaḥ |
1051:30: yathā gataṃ na gamyate nāgataṃ na gamyamānam,
1051:31: evamagnināpi dagdhaṃ na dahyate nādagdhaṃ dahyata ityādinā samaṃ vācyam |
1051:32: yathā ca na gataṃ nāgataṃ na gamyamānaṃ gamyate, evam -
1051:33: na dṛṣṭaṃ dṛśyate tāvadadṛṣṭaṃ naiva dṛśyate |
1051:36: yathā ca gantā na gacchati tāvadityādyuktam,
1051:37: evaṃ na dagdhā dahati tāvadityādi vācyam |
1051:38: evaṃ na draṣṭā paśyati tāvadityādinā agnidṛṣṭāntena saha gamyamānagatāgatairyasmātsamaṃ dūṣaṇam,
1051:40: tataśca siddhametat- svātmavad darśanaṃ parānapi na paśyatīti ||3||
1051:47: yadyapi darśanaśabdādanantaraṃ ślokabandhānurodhena darśana paśyatīti pāṭhaḥ,
1051:48: tathāpi vyākhyānakāle paśyatīti darśanamityevaṃ kathametattu yujyate iti paṭhitavyam ||4||
1051:49: kiṃ cānyat - iha paśyatīti darśanamityucyamāne darśanakriyayā darśanasvabhāvasya vā cakṣuṣaḥ saṃbandhaḥ parikalpyeta,
1051:53: darśanasvabhāvasya tāvad dṛśikriyāyuktasya bhūyaḥ paśyatītyādinā saṃbandho nopapadyate dṛśikriyādvayaprasaṅgāt darśanadvayaprasaṅgācca |
1051:54: adarśanamapi na paśyati darśanakriyārahitatvādaṅgūlyaya vadityābhiprāyaḥ | yadā
1051:59: ye tu manyante - nirvyāpāraṃ hīdaṃ dharmamātramutpadyamānamutpadyate iti,
1051:72: kriyāvān śāśvato nāsti nāsti sarvagate kriyā |
1051:73: niṣkriyo nāstinā tulyo nairātmyaṃ kiṃ na te priyam ||iti |
1051:87: na paśyati yadātmānaṃ kathaṃ drakṣyati tatparān ||
1051:92: na tasya karmakaraṇe vidyete tadyathā vandhyāsūnoḥ |
1051:93: asti ca draṣṭuḥ karaṇaṃ darśanaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ ca karma |
1051:104: tadā siddhasya vā darśanāpekṣā syādasiddhasya vā |
1051:105: tatra siddho draṣṭā na hi darśanamapekṣate |
1051:106: kiṃ siddhasya sato draṣṭuḥ punardarśanāpek ṣā kuryāt?
1051:107: na hi siddhaṃ punarapi sādhyata iti |
1051:113: tadevaṃ tiraskṛtyātiraskṛtya vā darśanaṃ yadā draṣṭā nāsti, tadā -
1051:114: draṣṭavyaṃ darśanaṃ caiva draṣṭaryasati te kutaḥ ||6||
1051:115: draṣṭaryasati nirhetuke draṣṭavyadarśane na saṃbhavataḥ iti kutastatsadbhāvād draṣṭā prasetsyati?
1051:120: iti draṣṭavyaṃ darśanaṃ ca pratītya vijñānamutpadyate |
1051:130: iha draṣṭurabhāvād draṣṭavyadarśane api na sta ityuktam |
1051:137: yadā tu draṣṭavyadarśanābhāvādvijñānādi catuṣṭayaṃ naivāsti, tadā -
1051:141: vyākhyātaṃ śravaṇaṃ ghrāṇaṃ rasanaṃ sparśanaṃ manaḥ |
1051:145: na cakṣuḥ prekṣate rūpaṃ mano dharmānna vetti ca |
1051:146: etatta paramaṃ satyaṃ yatra loko na gāhate ||
1051:151: no cakṣuṣi rūpa niśritaṃ rūpasaṃkrānti na caiva cakṣuṣi ||
1051:155: na kahiṃci gataṃ na cāgataṃ śūnya māyopama yogi paśyati ||
1051:157: sarva sayogi tu paśyati cakṣustatra na paśyati pratyayahīnam |
1051:158: naiva ca cakṣu prapaśyati rūpaṃ tena sayogaviyogavikalpaḥ ||
1051:160: yena ca yogasamāśritacakṣustena na paśyati cakṣu kadāci ||
1051:161: yo'pi ca śrūyati śabdu manojñaḥ so'pi ca nāntari jātu praviṣṭaḥ |
1051:162: saṃkramaṇaṃ na ca labhyati tasya kalpavaśāttu samucchritu śabdaḥ || iti ||
1051:164: gītaṃ na nṛtyamapi vādyarutaṃ na grāhyaṃ
1051:167: kiṃ kleśadāsa iva bālajano bhavāmi || iti ||
